file_content.text: I call Thothash heretic! I call him murderer, kin-slaver and Hutt-licker.
I should make an example of him. That's what the Jedi expect. That's what everyone expects.
But Thothash spilled blood with us. We'll find a new Wannschok and go into exile together. If we both return... I'll forgive him.
She has spoken, and we treasure her words. Honor the Chronicles of Ki Sazen.
